snippet: The Los Angeles Kings’ victory on Monday to win the Stanley Cup was seen by an average of 4.9 million viewers, down 10 percent from the comparable game last year between the Bruins and Canucks.
abstract: Los Angeles Kings Stanley Cup victory over New Jersey Devils is seen by an average of 4.9 million viewers, down 10 percent from the comparable game last year between the Boston Bruins and Vancouver Canucks.
lead_paragraph: The Los Angeles Kings’ victory on Monday to win the Stanley Cup was seen by an average of 4.9 million viewers, down 10 percent from the comparable game last year between the Bruins and Canucks.

headline.seo: Stanley Cup Viewership Down From Last Year
headline.main: Stanley Cup Viewership Down From Last Year
